DOC.brief_summary: This phase 2 study investigate safety efficacy PAC-14028 cream Atopic Dermatitis patient .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Safety Efficacy PAC-14028 Cream Adults With Atopic Dermatitis
DOC.detailed_description: PAC-14028 Cream ( 0.1 % , 0.3 % , 1.0 % ) placebo treat Mild Moderate Atopic Dermatitis patient twice daily 8 week .
DOC.criteria: Male female patient age 19 70 year . Who diagnose Atopic Dermatitis accord Haniffin Rajka criterion . Whose affect BSA 5 % IGA score 2 ( mild ) 3 ( moderate ) . Who voluntarily agree participate study sign informed consent form . Who skin disease atopic dermatitis scar affect area affect study , determine study investigator . Who clinically significant medical history disease involve liver , kidney , neurological system , psychical disorder affect study result . Who use systemic steroid , antibiotic , immunosuppressant , receive photochemical therapy within 28 day study drug administration . Who use topical steroid , immunosuppressant antibiotic treat atopic dermatitis within 14 day study drug administration . Who use expect inevitably use prohibited concomitant medication study . Women pregnant /breastfeeding , childbearing potential use available contraceptive . Who dose study medication within 30 day screen . Who determine ineligible study participation investigator reason .
